title: Design and Implementation of Open Educational Resources (OER)-Based Open Educational Practices

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and secondary education experience
context.additional_context: Program for in-service secondary school teachers to enhance OER (Open Educational Resources)-based lesson design capabilities, seeking solutions to regional educational disparities through collaborative learning and knowledge sharing among practitioners.

learning_goals: Can explain the concept of OER and legal/ethical utilization principles
Collaborative tools (e.g., Padlet) can be utilized to co-develop OER-based instructional materials with fellow teachers
Teachers can design a process for searching, analyzing, and applying OERs suitable to their subject area
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
